Obtain the X model matrix from a broken stick model

Source: R/get.R
get_X.Rd

Obtain the X model matrix from a broken stick model

get_X(object, ids = NULL)

Arguments

object

An object of class brokenstick
ids

A vector specifying the id's of the persons. If omitted, all id's are included.

Value

A matrix with number of columns equal to the number of knots. The result is NULL if object is not of class brokenstick.

Examples

get_X(fit_200, ids = c(10001, 10002))
#>            x1         x2         x3        x4     x5     x6     x7     x8
